title: Chelmsford
summary: Chelmsford (/ˈtʃɛlmzfərd/)[2] is a city and the county town of Essex, in the East of England. It is located in the London commuter belt, approximately 30 miles (50 kilometres) northeast of the notional centre of London at Charing Cross and approximately 22 miles (35 kilometres) from Colchester. The urban area of the city has a population of approximately 112,000,[1] while the wider City of Chelmsford district has a population of 168,310.[3][4]
